TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CaptureMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica las directivas de captura del mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se establece al elemento, la captura del mouse se aplica solo para el elemento que ha capturado el mouse.When is set to Element, mouse capture is applied only to the element which has captured the mouse. Cuando está establecido en el subárbol, captura del mouse se aplica al elemento que tiene la captura del mouse o uno de sus elementos secundarios si el mouse está sobre el elemento secundario.When is set to SubTree, mouse capture is applied to the element that has mouse capture or one of its child elements if the mouse is over the child element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode Element = int32(1)

summary.span: La captura del mouse se aplica a un único elemento.

span.span: Mouse capture is applied to a single element.

summary.span: La entrada del mouse se desplaza al elemento capturado.

span.span: Mouse input goes to the captured element.

summary.span: No hay ninguna captura del mouse.
La entrada del mouse se desplaza al elemento situado bajo el mouse.

span.span: Mouse input goes to the element under the mouse.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode SubTree = int32(2)

summary.span: La captura del mouse se aplica a un subárbol de elementos.

span.span: Mouse capture is applied to a subtree of elements.

summary.span: Si el mouse está situado sobre un elemento secundario del elemento con captura, la entrada del mouse se envía al elemento secundario.

span.span: If the mouse is over a child of the element with capture, mouse input is sent to the child element.

summary.span: De lo contrario, la entrada del mouse se envía al elemento con la captura del mouse.

span.span: Otherwise, mouse input is sent to the element with mouse capture.
